resources.string: Take break if your use exceed more than 30 minutes by stretching blinking your eyes/moving head forward/backward and clockwise and anticlockwise/stretching your arms and legs."

It is first step toward promotion of healthy use of technology. I.Keep a log of your online activities for each day. II keep a log of activities you are missing due to your engagement with online activities and others are raising concerns about your online activities . III. Identify the situations associated with excessive use of online activities e.g boredom, lonliness etc.IV. Help your to understand /differentiate the work , recreational nonpurposive use of online activities"
Address: NIMHANS centre for well being (NCWB),#1/B, 9th Main, 1st Phase, 1st Stage, BTM Layout, Bengaluru- 560076,Karnataka.
